Package domain

Class Kakuro

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Kakuro
  • public class Kakuro
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic class used to created Kakuros.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Kakuro()
      Default empty Kakuro constructor.
      Kakuro​(int x, int y)
      Kakuro constructor that generates a kakuro with random black cells and it has unique solution

    • Constructor Detail

      • Kakuro

        public Kakuro()
        Default empty Kakuro constructor.

      • Kakuro

        public Kakuro​(int x,
              int y)
        Kakuro constructor that generates a kakuro with random black cells and it has unique solution
        Parameters:
        x - It indicates the number of rows that the Kakuro will have.
        y - It indicates the number of columns that the Kakuro will have.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdKakuro

        public int getIdKakuro()
        Consultant function
        Returns:
        It returns the id of the kakuro

      • setIdKakuro

        public void setIdKakuro​(int idKakuro)
        Modifier function
        Parameters:
        idKakuro - It indicates the id of the kakuro

      • proposeKakuro

        public java.lang.Boolean proposeKakuro​(int numRows,
                                       int numColumns,
                                       java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method checks if the Kakuro proposed by the user is valid and it is created.
        Parameters:
        numRows - It indicates the number of rows that the Kakuro will have.
        numColumns - It indicates the number of columns that the Kakuro will have.
        field - It has the information of every individual Cell in the Kakuro.
        Returns:
        TRUE if there is a solution of the kakuro proposed FALSE if there isn't a solution of the kakuro proposed

      • listKakuro

        public java.lang.String[][] listKakuro()
        Consultant function
        Returns:
        It returns a matrix of the information of all the cells of the kakuro

      • solveKakuroMultiple

        public boolean solveKakuroMultiple()
        Multiple kakuro solver
        Returns:
        TRUE if there are multiple solution of the kakuro FALSE if there is unique solution
